title: Is it my internet or Riot?
body:
So I hop on to League of Legends to play a game. I log in to my account and everything on the client is good so far. I select a game mode and wait for a game. Once I get a game I lock in my champion and get in loading screen. Now here's where the problem starts. While in the loading screen, two things can happen:

1)The loading percentage freezes between 40% to 60% then I instantly get disconnected. 
OR
2)I load in the game without any problems

If I do load in game several things could happen. These things are:
1)I move for a bit then I instantly freeze while everyone moves. After a while everyone freezes then I disconnect.
2)I buy my items and select my first ability but it doesn't show that I have purchased that item or even upgraded my first ability.
3)I move from spawn to lane then after a few seconds I instantly return to base.
4)I randomly disconnect during team fights but then reconnect a few seconds after.

Note that my ping every games ranges from 16 to 23 ms and now it ranges from 23 to 38 ms. I also have an increase in fps where I usually used to have 40 to 60 fps and now i have 60 to 75 fps. An increase in ping and fps would normally mean that I would DC during the game. 

This has been happening for my past few games and it has been very annoying DC'ing at least 10 times every game. I have restarted my router and reinstalled league several times but it doesn't seem to fix the problem

You can check my [OP.gg](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Sk8rL8r) and see that the games I've lost or won has a high death count as I DC during team fights and duels. I haven't played league for the past week due to this reoccurring problem since I don't want to receive a leaverbuster for something that I believe is not my fault.

[Update] So I played an intro bots game and just before I got on the loading screen, the chat box on the lower left of champ select showed that every person in the lobby had left the server except me.

replies.body:
Sounds more like an ISP issue than a LoL issue.

Do all the regular things like resetting router and fiber box, running a diagnostic/repair on your OS network connection and just pray that helps.

[edit] did you just reset router, or connection box as well? Did you reset your PC network adapter? Did you pray to RNGesus?
Yes I have reset my router and connection box and league still hasn't worked. I've also prayed to RNGesus but it didn't work either :(. I'll try to pray harder next time.
